Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.infrastructure.repositories

Class InMemoryCategoryRepository

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.infrastructure.repositories.InMemoryCategoryRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
CategoryRepositoryInterface
public class InMemoryCategoryRepository extends Object implements CategoryRepositoryInterface
In-memory implementation of the CategoryRepositoryInterface, managing records storage.
